title: Look at These Assholes - Lowlights of the Trump Family | Solange Knowles
itunes:title: Look at These Assholes - Lowlights of the Trump Family | Solange Knowles
description:
Trevor highlights ugly behavior by members of the Trump family, Dulce Sloan discusses disheartening workplace studies, and Solange Knowles talks about "When I Get Home."
